src/controllers/knob/knob.html:
<svg
        id="{{id}}"
        aria-hidden="true"
        viewBox="0 0 300 300"
        width="100%"
        height="100%"
        class="sisiliano-knob">
    <defs
            id="defs4">
        <filter style="color-interpolation-filters:sRGB;" id="{{id}}-drop-shadow" x="-100%" y="-100%" width="300%" height="400%">
            <feFlood flood-opacity="0.5" flood-color="{{color.[1]}}" result="flood"></feFlood>
            <feComposite in="flood" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="in" result="comp"></feComposite>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="0" result="offset"></feOffset>
            <feGaussianBlur in="offset" stdDeviation="4" result="blur"></feGaussianBlur>
            <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" mode="normal"></feBlend>
        </filter>
        <filter style="color-interpolation-filters:sRGB;" id="{{id}}-hover-drop-shadow" x="-100%" y="-100%" width="300%" height="400%">
            <feFlood flood-opacity="0.5" flood-color="{{color.[1]}}" result="flood"></feFlood>
            <feComposite in="flood" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="in" result="comp"></feComposite>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="0" result="offset"></feOffset>
            <feGaussianBlur in="offset" stdDeviation="6" result="blur"></feGaussianBlur>
            <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" mode="normal"></feBlend>
        </filter>
    </defs>

    <style>
        #{{id}} .sisiliano-knob-circle,
        #{{id}} .sisiliano-border {
            filter: url("#{{id}}-drop-shadow");
        }

        #{{id}} .sisiliano:focus .sisiliano-knob-circle {
            filter: url("#{{id}}-hover-drop-shadow");
        }
    </style>

    <rect
            class="sisiliano-border-div sisiliano-border"
            width="100%"
            height="100%"
            rx="50%"
            ry="50%"
            x="0"
            y="0">
    </rect>

    <g class="sisiliano-controller-div">
        <circle
                class="sisiliano-knob-circle sisiliano-knob-background-circle"
                id="circle5634"
                r="130"
                cx="150"
                cy="150"/>
        <text xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" x="40" y="170"
              class="unselectable sisiliano-knob-value-text">
            100
        </text>
        <circle
                class="sisiliano-knob-circle sisiliano-knob-value-circle"
                fill="transparent"
                id="circle5636"
                r="130"
                cx="150"
                cy="150"
                transform="rotate(90, 150, 150)"
                stroke-width="20"/>
    </g>
</svg>
src/controllers/linear-slider/linear-sli:
<svg
        id="{{id}}"
        aria-hidden="true"
        width="100%"
        height="100%"
        class="sisiliano-linear-slider">
    <defs
            id="defs4">
        <filter style="color-interpolation-filters:sRGB;" id="{{id}}-drop-shadow" x="-100%" y="-100%" width="300%" height="400%">
            <feFlood flood-opacity="0.5" flood-color="{{color.[1]}}" result="flood"></feFlood>
            <feComposite in="flood" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="in" result="comp"></feComposite>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="0" result="offset"></feOffset>
            <feGaussianBlur in="offset" stdDeviation="4" result="blur"></feGaussianBlur>
            <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" mode="normal"></feBlend>
        </filter>
        <filter style="color-interpolation-filters:sRGB;" id="{{id}}-hover-drop-shadow" x="-100%" y="-100%" width="300%" height="400%">
            <feFlood flood-opacity="0.5" flood-color="{{color.[1]}}" result="flood"></feFlood>
            <feComposite in="flood" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="in" result="comp"></feComposite>
            <feOffset dx="0" dy="0" result="offset"></feOffset>
            <feGaussianBlur in="offset" stdDeviation="6" result="blur"></feGaussianBlur>
            <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" mode="normal"></feBlend>
        </filter>
    </defs>

    <style>
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-background-rect,
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-value-rect,
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer,
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer-hover,
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-value-label,
        #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-border {
            filter: url("#{{id}}-drop-shadow");
        }

        .sisiliano:focus #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-background-rect,
        .sisiliano:focus #{{id}}.sisiliano-linear-slider .sisiliano-linear-slider-value-rect {
            filter: url("#{{id}}-hover-drop-shadow");
        }
    </style>

    <rect
            class="sisiliano-border-div sisiliano-border"
            width="100%"
            height="100%"
            x="0"
            y="0">
    </rect>

    <g class="sisiliano-controller-div">
        <rect
                class="sisiliano-linear-slider-rect sisiliano-linear-slider-background-rect"
                height="8"
                width="10"
                x="40"
                y="37"/>
        <rect
                class="sisiliano-linear-slider-rect sisiliano-linear-slider-value-rect"
                height="10"
                width="200"
                x="40"
                y="36"/>
        <g class="sisiliano-linear-slider-ruler"></g>
        <rect
                class="sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer-hover"
                width="30"
                height="30"
                rx="50%"
                ry="50%"
                x="90"
                y="26">
        </rect>
        <rect
                class="sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer sisiliano-linear-slider-value-pointer"
                width="20"
                height="20"
                rx="50%"
                ry="50%"
                x="90"
                y="31">
        </rect>
        <rect
                class="sisiliano-linear-slider-value-label"
                x="10"
                y="0"
                fill="{{color}}"
                width="50"
                height="20"
                rx="2"
                ry="2">
        </rect>
        <text text-anchor="middle"
              x="10"
              y="15"
              class="unselectable sisiliano-linear-slider-value-text">
            100
        </text>
    </g>
</svg>
